name: canshare-who-haematology-lymphoma-not-sll-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid lymphoma excluding small lymphocytic disease histology
description: Histologies used for lymphoma (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours, latest edition) excluding samll lymphocytic disease or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: (^297181000210101 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid peripheral T-cell lymphoma histology reference set| OR ^394281000210109 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid Epstein-Barr virus positive T-cell and natural killer cell lymphoiod proliferation histology reference set (foundation metadata concept)| OR ^297171000210103 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid primary cutaneous T-cell lymphoma histology reference set| OR ^394271000210107 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid intestinal T-cell and NK-cell lymphoid proliferation histology reference set (foundation metadata concept)| OR 314926009 |T-cell lymphoma| OR ^394291000210106 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid aggressive B cell lymphoma histology reference set (foundation metadata concept)| OR ^394301000210105 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid indolent B cell lymphoma histology reference set (foundation metadata concept)| OR 74964007 |Other|) MINUS 51092000 |Chronic lymphocytic leukaemia/small lymphocytic lymphoma|
